name: Davis Graham
text: This is a great location! Wait times usually aren't long, and the food is great! ‚Ä¶More

name: Tofu Bazooka
text: Staff was nice and my gf ordered some pizza that she didn't really like and they let her keep it, made her another and didn't charge us. And of course we go here cause they have vegan options. Follow your heart cheese is so good!

name: Robbert Fairbrother
text: 10" with garlic and olive oil base, vegan cheese, portabella mushrooms, caramelized onions, spinach, basil, Buffalo flavored tofu. First, I'm impressed that they have vegan cheese! I also appreciated the waitress making recommendations for ‚Ä¶More

name: Calanda Marks
text: The customer service was awesome and friendly (AMANDA). She was at the bar and she took our order, explained to us about the vegan style crust. Well return soon. Very highly recommended to visit. Prices and food was worth it.

name: Dalena Norman
text: The customer service could be better at Mellow Mushroom. The service wait was entirely too long for me and some of the staff seem to be in their own little world having a much better time than I was as I tried to gain their attention to ‚Ä¶More

name: dianna hall
text: We had the best service tonight at Mellow Mushroom!  Ashleigh was fun and energetic and made sure we were taken care of.  The pizza was wonderful too!

name: Agila Elfallah
text: Server was super friendly and helpful. Pizza is always good. Good for a late night eat

name: Jason Hatter
text: Lunch special is fine. Food is always solid. Service is usually very slow so I would avoid if you have a time constraint. Parking is horrible.

name: Chris Linden
text: Mellow Mushroom is our favorite pizzeria. They don't make their pizzas on a conveyer belt.  They use real pizza ovens.  Their crust is outstanding. We love the magical mystery tour pizza which is not on the regular menu but is found on ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Estis
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. I absolutely despise wearing a mask. Ready for Trump 2020.

name: Erica Royal
text: I ordered a cheese calzone... To go... 40 minutes ago... I have sat here waiting. Watched a fairly large group that ordered after me get their food... Yet I am STILL sitting here waiting on a very small order. Will not return.

name: Andrew Bloodworth
text: 10/10. Server was awesome. Food was delicious! Took a little while but I work in food service so I didn't care.  Will be back the next time I'm in town!

name: T. Barber
text:
Food is fresh and tasty!
Service is excellent!

name: Clint Jones
text: The best crust in the area. Davinci's is my favorite cheese pizza. But for a pizza with toppings, a specialty, this is THE place. That crust is special.

name: jessica easterling
text: The best calzones hands down! I had a really good experience here. Our waiter was Jeremiah.  He was really good. Our drinks stayed full and the food came out in a timely manner. We will be going back in a couple of days to try the pizza! Cant wait!

name: Alexis Eady
text: Walked in during the lunch lull and the only person to say anything was the cook behind the line, so I went to black market grill instead. I'm sure they're usually great but I felt unnoticed. Sad day

name: Jason Bermuda
text: Staff was great at lunch.  Didn't wait long for my meal.

name: ALAbam 22
text: Where were you on our wedding day, we were at our favorite place. Mellow mushroom. Amazing service, and incredible food.

name: Pat Bradford
text: I've been here several weekdays for trivia and dinner. The service has always been good and fast, pizzas come out quickly and HOT. The menu offers a myriad of toppings/ways to customize your pizza, but there are also other viable options, ‚Ä¶More

name: Yoruba Harris
text: OMG!!!!! I know I'm a year late with this review, but guess what good food stays on the tongue!!! Whoever made my calzone at the Southside location needs a whooping!!!! It was soooo good, and the ingredients were so fresh. It's nothing like ‚Ä¶More

name: Caleb
text: The atmosphere is very contemporary, and taking the "Mellow" in the title seriously. Though reasonably priced with a tasty house special pizza (plenty of veggies and protein on this large serving), the service was sub-par. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Fitzpatrick
text: Very nice spot 2 sit and eat outside

name: Sharana Carter
text: Food was good, but service was very slow

name: Jameka Thomas
text: Cool atmosphere. Order 4 different pizzas and 2 of them were wrong. We had a longer wait time than I expected. Manager corrected the issue with our 2 correct pizzas in a to go box. Pizza was tasty!

name: Shawn Robins
text: This spot is the one I always prefer. I go to many restaurants but to this restaurant I keep coming back again and again. The stuff is very attentive and the food they offer is so fresh and tasty. I am always happy to have a nice meal in this restaurant. I highly recommend this place.

name: Wm George
text: At the first moment  you enter that restaurant  they give you an excellent feeling. Very hospitable team, it is a friendly restaurant to to go out with friends and colleagues or with your date. enjoyable  cuisine, creative  chef de cuisine, reasonable  price and nice  service. Warmly recommended.

name: Houston Lamb
text: Very good pizza mediocre service. I highly recommend the Maui Waui.

name: Sandra Wilson
text:
Great Calzone!
This was seriously one of the best calzones I have ever had..
Comfortable atmosphere, waiter was very attentive.. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Berkowitz
text: Really good pizza with an excellent crust, but their standard tomato sauce is too sweet. Very slow service. And the pretzel bites taste nothing like pretzel.

name: Jimmy Jacobs
text:
love Mellow Mushroom. The food is always good and the atmosphere is friendly.
The sandwiches are good, but need a little moistening against the bread on the inside. However, I ordered me a funky Q Pizza to take with me and three slices ‚Ä¶More

name: Nightrat
text: Great food and great atmosphere. Loved the vegan options! Ann's was amazing!! She wad very knowledgeable about the menu. We will definitely be back!!

name: David Burrell
text: My favorite pizza place on the planet, always great food and service.

name: Virginia Frost
text: Mellow Mushroom is fantastic! It's trendy in atmosphere and delicious in taste. I recommend it for only your most fabulous friends. You will be amazed at how much they thank you üòä

name: Kristi Pruitt
text: We came to Birmingham to spend one night on our road trip from Texas to Indiana. We wheeled in after dark on a rainy night and were ready to grab fast food for dinner after a long and weary travel day. I asked Siriwhat restaurants were ‚Ä¶More

name: Erin Mahaffey
text: Very cool atmosphere with that authentic 5 points vibe. The only chain restaurant we would eat and pay that much for downtown. Great place for photo ops as well.

name: Gretchen Wilson
text: They have great salads. We all had salads and appetizers. The salads were crisp, the appetizers tasted fresh. We have also had salads and pizza in the past also good. Staff is cheerful and customer focused.

name: Daniel Minor
text: I got a meatball sub, and a beer, because I wanted a cold beer, and after 30 minutes, I received a warm can of beer and was told to leave or we are calling the cops.    That just happened and I promise it is true

name: Candice Wilkerson
text: Avocado sub is great!

name: Ronnie O'Brien Rice, PhD, Attorney
text: Website had a glitch. Called the restaurant and the person who answered the phone stating that they don‚Äôt take delivery orders over the phone. Great vegan selection, but the person answering the phone doesn‚Äôt understand the concept of great customer service. A $100 order turned down.

name: Sherri Kyle
text: Good food and great service, great atmosphere. Love the art too.

name: John Yost
text: Very good pizza. The decor-not so much! It's kid-centric and garish. Ok for kids but not adults. Worth it for the pizza.

name: caity buford
text: Great food and incredibly helpful and friendly staff

name: CURTIS BOOTHE
text:
Had lunch with friends and had an awesome server named Cole, that played along with us and made us feel welcome.
Good food and great service.

name: Danny Thornton
text: The service in this restaurant was fantastic. We took a group of five and and we would seated immediately on a Friday night. The waitress was very attentive to our needs and kept our glasses full. The food was outstanding as was the ‚Ä¶More

name: Glenn Fuller
text: Best pizza I‚Äôve had in a decade, with the friendliest, cheerful & most helpful waitress (Stephanie?) I‚Äôve experienced whilst travelling. Recommended without hesitation.

name: Laketta Bell

name: Krystal Mason

name: Robert Owen
text: The food is excellent, the staff is exceptional, and the music and atmosphere is exemplary! I strongly suggest visiting the Mellow Mushroom restaurant at the corner of 20th St. South and 12th Ave. South in Birmingham, Al.

name: Brent Matulnes
text: Great place to get pizza! Great service as well!

name: Nick Lopez
text: Always good. Vegan options.

name: Vicki Wilson
text: Our waiter was fantastic!  Cole was very sweet and attentive.  Thank you Cole for a wonderful lunch hour!!!

name: Karla Kuhlman
text: Wish i could give more STARS. This place never let's me down. Great employees they never act like you are interrupting their life by showing up. They treat you so very welcoming anf the service is great atmosphere wonderful. Amazing food and people. Good job MELLOW MUSHROOM YOU ROCK

name: Pamela Sparks
text: I love this place! The food is always fresh and tastes great! We enjoy watching the guys spinning the pizza crusts by hand! They seemed to be a little low on wait staff during this visit but my hat goes off to the 2 servers working the entire dining area:)

name: Beth Hall
text: Food was great....service was slow

name: Jessica Evans
text: Went here for the first time last night. It was GREAT!!! I wish I could remember the servers name because she was a sweetheart. (Young, dark hair, glasses). She had our meal brought to us in perfect order. Appetizers on table before my ‚Ä¶More

name: Olivia Elmore
text: Oh my goodness, everything is so funky here!! The walls, the names of their food, literally EVERYTHING! The pizza they serve is hands-down the best pie I've had, and trust me I've had a lot of pizza!! Their hot wings are very very good as well, it has a great flavor.

name: Brandon DeVault
text: Quick and awesome service! We love the pizzas here (especially the buffalo chicken pizza) - the salads are pretty good too!

name: Larry Sedar
text: Good food, nice waitstaff good value

name: Anna Holland-Levine
text: Fairly good pizza. The. Worst. Service. Took 20 minutes to get a water, 40 for the salads, they forgot to put in one of our pizzas, all after knowing we were on a tight timeline. Grungy outdoor tables.

name: Brent Beck
text: Great place for pizza. Calzones. Salads. Etc. Great service. Great food.

name: Lynn Terry
text: Great food and drinks in prime Five Points South location. TV over bar area for sports fans! Friendly fast service. Outside patio heated with some nostalgic mix and match seating.

name: Darien
text: Great service! Our server gave us spot on recommendations for drinks and was attentive to making sure we got everything. The popsicles at the end were the cherry on top! Will be coming back in the near future for more good food, drinks, and fun!

name: John Tipper
text: Quite good service and nice food. The Greek Salad was delicious and the chicken salad sandwich was tasty. We will definitely go back.  Good atmosphere as well.

name: Terry Thao
text: Clean place, good food, and a polite server. He got my order wrong but he did not charge me for the extra pizza nor drinks.

name: Casey Thomas
text: I had an amazing time at The Mellow Mushroom! My friend and my boyfriend and I went there the other night. The atmosphere is Amazing! The food is awesome! It was so wonderful to be able to sit there and watch the Alabama Football üèà game ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Meuse
text: Always a pleasant experience. Very casual, laid back atmosphere. Sometimes service can be a tad slow, but the employees make up for it by having really easy-going attitudes. Great beer selection including local brews as well!

name: Brian Robertson
text: Food excellent great service

name: Ryan Hamilton
text: Good food and friendly staff

name: Rich Dansereau
text: I usually get the pizza which is really good; the calzone, not so much.

name: Kristin Vance
text: My favorite thing here is the Greek salad, their esperanza dressing is AMAZING. The pizza crust is bubbly and thin. I prefer more flavor on the crust. They have a great variety of toppings for the pizzas. They have an excellent local beer selection. We enjoy going as a family.

name: James
text: Quick and great service. PIZZA NEEDS MORE SAUCE. Is it worth a lot to you?  Good, though.

name: P Bark
text: Ok, notice clean, some staff washed their hands some didn't but I guess it doesn't matter if the people who eat the food don't wash thier hands neither, score card wss good, waitress we had was nice but lazy, mushroom soup was AWESOME.

name: Maxwell Lord
text: My girlfriend is gluten free and a vegan, so naturally a nightmare to feed. Never the less the fact that pizza is neither. This place accommodated her, so I'll be eternally grateful.

name: Patrick Read
text: Great food, great price

name: Jake Alexander
text: Great food in a great location. They have many specialty pizzas most places dont have. I always get the Jerk Chicken sandwich on a wheat hoagie. Nothing comes close to it and a full sandwich is just the right size to fill you up

name: Tim Sams
text: My first visit to a mellow mushroom, what a funky place, I do believe our waiter was high, but the pizza was very good. not much room for parking. overall a great experience

name: Margarita Hart
text: Such good pizza and a very convenient location. Possibly the best chicken pizza in the area, very fresh since it‚Äôs made to order, seasoned to taste and staff is willing to personalize to the customer‚Äôs preferences! All of it is decent, I haven't ever ordered something that I regretted.

name: Jacqueline Dorris
text: Delicious food - staff is always over the top friendly. Great place to wind down with some brews and pizza!

name: Max Cribb

text: My sweetie and I are pizza connissoueurs. Or so we like to call ourselves. He introduced me to Mellow Mushroom about two years ago. Since then it has become one of our regular pizza stops. We usually order the large sausage and pepperoni. ‚Ä¶More

text: I really love this place.  The pizza is incredible.  The crust is always perfect.  The taste never disappoints.  One can only attribute this to quality ingredients, the superior stone baked method, and workers who really care about what ‚Ä¶More

text: Food is great needs new management

name: Craig Winn

name: Angie Gibson
text: One of the best Mellow Mushrooms I‚Äôve been to

text: We ordered a large pepperoni and sausage pizza and I felt like the toppings were pretty cheap...I can make a pizza with hormel pepperoni at home for less than $25. We only went there because post office pies was too busy and decided to give them a try. We were not pleased!

name: Joshua Lamb
text: Had a party of 20 chaotic disorderly people who were rowdy and wild. The staff here handled it all so well, all the orders were right, the food was stupendous. name: Sharon Bahm
text: Great pizza great service.

name: J Dodson

name: Jillian Chappell
text: Sat on the patio and enjoyed some great food. Had the calzone, and it was DELICIOUS!  Also had the pretzel bites with the beer cheese dip. So good!! Great food and friendly service. Recommend!!

name: Phillip Workman

text: The food was fantastic and the atmosphere was so much fun. I was at a Science Olympiad competition and was very stressed, but our sever, Molly, was very down to earth and so much fun, she relaxed my nerves and helped me get through the rest of the day.

name: Anthony Mitchell
text: This place has fantastic tasting food, and the customer service is amazing!..I definitely having been telling all my friends.

name: Liz
text: The jerk chicken with a pesto base is absolutely delicious. I also recommend the house dressing with your salad. It's not sweet which is why I like it. The servers are pretty cool and will check on you often. There's outside seating and dogs are welcome. They even have bowls for them!

name: Kimberley Williams
text: Carlton was our server and he was an awesome server! Knowledgeable and funny! My superhero who made coffee appear like magic! This place has amazing coffee and Greek salad!

name: Audrey Quinn
text: Service was nice and friendly. Food was delicious. The atmosphere was laid back with a family and sports feel.

text: Not easy to access if you're interested in a quick pickup or an easy in and out.  It is a popular trendy place in a popular area of town with  Limited parking which equates to  limited access.  The pizza is a bit pricey but still a good value. Price point for 2 before drinks is around 30 dollars

text: Mellow Mushroom always has a great atmosphere. It has a relaxed and fun vibe. The server i had was excellent. She made out table feel relaxed and kept us laughing. The only problem I had was that they were out of the first 3 beers I asked for from the menu.

text: Great service and food!
